TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but not really

I wish for a nap

Granted, but you don't wake up. Ever.

I wish I would stop ninja'ing people.

Granted. *pulls out syringe*

I wish kittehs

granted, but they're made up of YOU

I wish for a maple tree

Granted, it explodes.

I wish people would stop ignoring my posts

....

I wish for moar bioman ignorance.

Granted. I will now ignore all your posts.

I wish for Rage to be ignored.

Granted. This gets very hard when I'm pointing a gun at you.

I wish for BLAM

Granted, your head goes BLAM

I wish creepy guys'd stop hitting on me

Granted. All the creepy guys are the hot/cute ones.

I wish for my gifs not to upset the mods.

Granted, now you havve to include 34 in each post and you soon run out

I wish for fairies to clean house for me

Granted they remove your organs as there cleaning your inside.

I wish for a cup of space.

Granted, but you have to live in there

I wish for one specific creepy guy to quit talking to me.

Granted he is next to you.

I wish that Trekkette broke the universe.

granted. you died

I wish to play Minecraft

Granted but the universe broke

I wish that I was a physics repair man.

Granted. You get killed in action.

I wish that I wasn't so sleepy.....zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz

Granted. You never sleep again

I wish to not wish.

Granted you implode

I wish that I fixed the universe.

Granted, but you weren't exactly skilled at your new job of Universe Repairman, and your ineptitude at fixing the universe causes so much damage to it after it gets "repaired" that it is now renamed to The Yooniferse.

I wish that the Soviet Saluyt space stations had actually used their space cannon in combat with another armed Salyut station, causing a epic battle to ensue, ending with both stations blowing eachother up with no survivors. (no really, a few of the stations were actually equipped with a modified aircraft cannon for use against possible attack satellites or even hostile boarders ).

Edited June 4, 2013 by (An Original Name)

Granted, but they blow each other up.

I wish I could sleep.

Granted, but you never wake up. Haven't I seen this wish before? With this same exact wish grant? Multiple times? Hmm...

I wish that everyone used google for everything.

granted it spontaneously lobotomises everyone

i wish for tree powers

Granted, but you are mistaken for a real tree and you get cut down.

I wish that Valve didn't release games on "Valve Time".

Granted. Now they release nothing at all

I wish for a better computer
